definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Swallow 200 micrograms a day of chromium polynicotinate.
sentences.chinese: 每天吞食200毫克的煙酸鉻。

sentences.english: The chromium in industrial wastewater could be removed with the scrap-iron fixed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 採用鐵屑固定牀反應器去除工業廢水中的鉻。

sentences.english: The instrumental neutron activation analysis was used to determine Cr content in chromium-rich yeast cells.
sentences.chinese: 利用中子活化分析法對富鉻酵母中的鉻進行了測定。

sentences.english: "The biggest surprise was chromium, " Mr Payne said.
The proposed method was demonstrated for the determination of chromium species in wastewaters.
sentences.chinese: 併成功用於實際廢水中不同形態鉻離子組份的測定。

sentences.english: The hot workability of high-carbon-chromium bearing steel has been studied by means of the hot torsion.
sentences.chinese: 用熱扭轉實驗方法研究高碳鉻軸承鋼的熱加工性能。

sentences.english: A method of separation and determination is applied to analysis chromium species in Dianchi.
sentences.chinese: 對滇池水中鉻形態化合物進行了分離和測定。

sentences.english: A laboratory study was conducted to investigate elec-trokinetically remediation of soils contaminated by chromium.
sentences.chinese: 對電動修復鉻污染土壤進行了實驗室研究。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometric method is proposed for the determination of chromium in steel with chrome blue-black R.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鉻藍黑R分光光度法測定鋼中微量鉻的方法。

sentences.english: Chromic lack brings about candy and adipose metabolization obstacle, affect coronary heart disease secondhand.
sentences.chinese: 鉻的缺乏導致糖和脂肪代謝障礙，間接影響冠心病。

sentences.english: Transformation of martensite into a network of chromium carbides.
sentences.chinese: 從馬氏體轉變成網狀的碳化鉻。

sentences.english: It was a massive console in cheap plastic chrome.
sentences.chinese: 嵌在廉價塑料鉻合金裏寬大的控制板。

sentences.english: Six price chromes returns to three price chromes after restored returning , the chemistry moderates to precipitate a processing.
sentences.chinese: 六價鉻經還原回三價鉻後，化學中和沉澱處理。

sentences.english: High chromium-nickel alloy side electrode maintains.
sentences.chinese: 高質量鉻鎳合金側電極保持精確的間隙。

sentences.english: The metal chromium can be recovered from chromium mud.
sentences.chinese: 同時可以從鉻泥中回收金屬鉻，回收率高。

definition: to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
variant of 銹|锈, to corrode/to rust
